description: '''Israel Perales Ortiz''' (September 1, 1972 â€“ July 23, 2015), better known by his stage name '''Mexicano 777''', was a Puerto Rican rapper who gained fame across [[Latin America]], and in the [[United States]]. Mexicano 777 was from [[Yabucoa, Puerto Rico]], and was considered to be one of the pioneers of [[Latin hip hop]] and [[reggaeton]].
